Texto: 
mild proptosis o.d.
radiation therapy
enhancing mass centered on right sphenoid ridge with extension into right orbit and middle cranial fossa.
lesion enhances following contrast.
pheochromocytoma, metastatic to orbit
• meningioma
• metastatic disease
• chondrosarcoma
• fibrous dysplasia
59 year old woman presents now with headache and proptosis. previous diagnosis of pheochromocytoma, 3 yrs ago.
she has a three year history of pheochromocytoma metastatic to ribs and pelvis - treated with radiation.  she presents now with headache and proptosis
